content:
Hey @T-lang and others:

I just pushed a new page to the lang-team.rust-lang.org website at https://lang-team.rust-lang.org/initiatives/process/checklists.html containing short checklists for how to do various things.

I'd love feedback on the overall setup. I've also removed the "active initiatives" table and am just linking to the project board.
also cc @Sean Chen (he/him) here too :) these are more procedural tasks

would second be an alias of merge?
